name: Penguin goes waddle waddle
description:
If you know The Duck Song you know what to expect. Penguin waddles around.

Thanks to my friend Chururin for abandoning all his art skill to doodle me these scuffed sprites in 5 mins. Check him out on Twitter, I swear his art is not like this normally, quite the opposite https://twitter.com/Churururin

As always I rushed this in an afternoon instead of using the whole month, yay.
